result.eng: The work will be easier after a while.

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.
result.ga: Bhí sí lách i dtús báire ach d'athraigh sí an port tar éis tamaill

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.

result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair tar éis a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: I didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.

result.eng: He was set free after five years in prison.

result.eng: You will get an e-mail after you register.

result.eng: They walked back to the place from which they had come.
result.ga: Shiúil siad ar ais go dtí an áit as a raibh siad tar éis teacht

result.eng: Come to me across the room.
result.ga: Tar chugam trasna an tseomra
result.orig: Tar chugam trasna an tseomra
result.html: Tar chugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.
result.ponchtml: Tar ċugam trasna an tseomraCome to me across the room.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
result.ga: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.orig: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteach
result.html: Tar éis an aighnis ar fad d'éirigh linn teacht ar réiteachAfter all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.

result.eng: After all, he is a politician, it is his job.
result.ga: Tar éis an tsaoil is polaiteoir é is é a jab é

result.eng: After he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ga: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.html: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ghearmáin ar feadh dhá bhliain tháinig feabhas mór ar a chuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.
result.ponchtml: Tar éis dó cónaí sa Ġearmáin ar feaḋ ḋá ḃliain ṫáinig feaḃas mór ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAfter he had ben living in Germany for two years, his German improved a lot.

result.eng: Although he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.
result.ga: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise
result.orig: Tar éis go raibh sé ina chónaí sa Ghearmáin le dhá bhliain níor tháinig feabhas ar bith ar a chuid Gearmáinise

result.ponchtml: Tar éis go raiḃ sé ina ċónaí sa Ġearmáin le ḋá ḃliain níor ṫáinig feaḃas ar biṫ ar a ċuid GearmáiniseAlthough he had been living in Germany for two years, his German did not improve at all.

result.eng: After a stormy night I would go out on the beach.

result.eng: Turn left after the hotel.

result.eng: Hello to you too. Come in. How are you?

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.

result.eng: It was obvious from her face that she had been crying.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: She had fallen out with her mother.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: After they returned home, the Prime Minister met them.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: Two minutes past nine, a second building in the Trade Center exploded.
